Vindictus.[EVENT] Welcome Sanyaa! Shayla's Gatheri:
]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/3953157/3f8956cb7853916773c2a0147f2c787c7add1e64.jpg[/img]


Event Period: 08/12 (Mon) - 09/10 (Tue)
[list][*]Per-Character event for characters Lv. 70 or higher[/*][/list]
 

1. When you log in with a character at Lv. 70+ during the event, 'Gathering Dungeon Entry Ticket' x1 is sent to the Mailbox (per Character).
[list][*]If a character below Lv. 70 reaches Lv. 70, sent via Mail.[/*][*]Entry Ticket Restriction Period: 9/10/2024 7 AM UTC[/*][/list]
2. When you log in with a character at Lv. 70+ during the event, you can start the 'Event: Shayla's Gathering Dungeon' story through [Shayla].

3. Regardless of the story progression, the 6 'Gathering Dungeons' below will rotate and open everyday at 7 AM UTC.
[list][*]Drop Blue Gathering Essence on M/W/F, Red Gathering Essence on T/Th/Sat, and both on Sunday[/*][/list]
4. You can depart for each Gathering Dungeon by using the entry ticket you received in the mail.

5. At the end of the dungeon, 'Vengeful Langro' appears.

 
[list][*]In area 1 of 'Gathering Dungeon', there are 5 gathering points for Luminary[/*][*]When you press 'Gathering (E key)' in those points, you randomly obtain one of the following items[/*][/list][table][tr][td]

[list][*]Hero Pass will have two parts: regular and premium (cash). Rewards are distributed upon completing each Hero Pass level.[/*][*]The Hero Pass Reward will be distributed to Account Mail and has an expiration period of 30 days.[/*][/list]
